keyword: calories protein style in n out
title: Calories in In-N-Out Protein Style Burger
meta_description: Discover calories protein style in n out, including full nutrition breakdown for one hamburger, protein content, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: Calories in In-N-Out Protein Style Burger
assumptions: In-N-Out hamburger patty, lettuce wrap, spread, tomato, onion; no bun; standard preparation.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact ingredients, and customizations. Values are estimates based on public data; check In-N-Out app or receipt for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out Protein Style Hamburger provides ~240 kcal and 17 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast food info.

faqs.q: How many calories protein style in n out hamburger?
faqs.a: About 240 kcal for one Protein Style Hamburger.

faqs.q: What's the protein in In-N-Out Protein Style?
faqs.a: Approximately 17 g protein per burger, mostly from the beef patty.

faqs.q: Are carbs low in protein style In-N-Out?
faqs.a: Yes, only ~11 g carbs due to no bun, from veggies and spread.

faqs.q: How does Protein Style compare to regular In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Protein Style saves ~150 kcal by skipping the bun, reducing carbs significantly.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in In-N-Out Protein Style?
faqs.a: Around 600 mg per burger, mainly from the spread and patty seasoning.
